about:
I'm Quinn. I'm currently a senior at the University of Washington studying Human Centered Design & Engineering and Quantitative Science. I'm currently seeking an entry level position/internship in experience and interface design, data science, or software development. While most of my expertise lies in programming, namely front-end web development and software development, I am incredibly intrigued by data, statistics, and the intersection of data, statistics, and programming.

I'm interested in working towards a cause I support like conserving and restoring the environment or protecting the wellbeing of those in need. I believe my technical background and interest in my work gives me a competitive edge in all my endeavors in and out of the workplace.

If you're interested in learning more, feel free to shoot me an email at the address below or connect with me on LinkedIn!
